etomica.util.numerical

Class AkimaSplineSmootherDy

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.util.numerical.AkimaSplineSmoother
      • etomica.util.numerical.AkimaSplineSmootherDy

  • public class AkimaSplineSmootherDy
extends AkimaSplineSmoother
    Optimization algorithm which attempts to smooth data without moving any point far from its original location. AkimaSplineSmootherDy specifically attempts to find a smooth function for dy/dx, which when integrated yields a function that matches the original y(x) within the original error bars.
